channel.title: Biostatistics on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Biostatistics on Tristan's website

item.title: Not just one statistics interview...John McGready is the Jon Stewart of statistics
item.description: _Editor’s Note: We usually reserve Friday’s for posting Simply Statistics Interviews. This week, we have a special guest post by John McGready, a colleague of ours who has been doing interviews with many of us in the department and has some cool ideas about connecting students in their first statistics class with cutting edge researchers wrestling with many of the same concepts applied to modern problems. I’ll let him explain…_
